p: The developed method was used successfully for the analysis of MeJA in MeJA-MRC. The chromatogram of the corresponding MeJA in MeJA-MRC is presented in Fig. 4 (d). The assay of MeJA in MeJA-MRC was found to be 94.6 ± 0.2% ( Table 3). Ideally, higher percentage of assay of a compound is desired while developing a method as it enables other investigator in the routine analysis of same compound as such, or in various other dosage forms.
